originalText.text: For me personally, whenever I ordered a sandwich with specific instructions, the chicken turned out barely warm/half cooked. They make their sandwich very fast, 5 mins tops but never satisfying.

text.text: For me personally, whenever I ordered a sandwich with specific instructions, the chicken turned out barely warm/half cooked. They make their sandwich very fast, 5 mins tops but never satisfying.

originalText.text: I order from this store on my lunch break and everytime I come in there, the cashier always has an attitude for no reason. I went to get a smoothie and she completely berated me for ordering my salad before getting the smoothie. However, the salad didn't take long to make and she didn't ring up the price of the items yet. Please don't waste your time here. They purposely mess up orders and catch attitudes on a daily basis. Will not be revisiting ever again. This has happened not once but several times. I don't even speak to them or treat them in a manner that calls for them to behave nastily towards me. It's always the woman at the cashier in the mornings and early afternoons.

originalText.text: I was coming from a meeting at The Max when I thought I’d stop at this little deli and grab a snack. I think the term deli is from the old days because this place is like a grocery store/restaurant. Huge and clean with the most diverse variety in the area. They even have a dining area that’s really very comfortable and warm. I was in there late night and the cook Miguel was very attentive, friendly and polite. I ordered cheese fries made with pepper jack cheese, and unlike some other places it didn’t have a few slices just laid on the top with a bunch of dry fries underneath. All my fries had cheese. Their Lattes are not my standard but those fries made it totally forgivable. I really like this place. By the way... they have a menu that rivals most restaurants in NYC. And in this town, that’s saying a lot. #nyc #nycdeli #themax #cheesefries #sankofatafari #kingofcoffeenyc #nyc

originalText.text: Yesterday before class I went to grab something to eat. I ordered a sausage egg and egg. When I opened it up to eat it. This is what I saw. This is extremely disgusting and I’m not sure if this is from the grill or what. But do better.

originalText.text: 10/10 every time I get my honey glazed turkey sandwich. The cashier’s at the front are always pleasant, respectful & kind and always takes care of any customer including my self who shop there or eats their food on the grill. Best lunch spot in the 57th and 11th ave area for me
